name: Idiopathic Pulmonary Hemosiderosis
chief_complaint: I keep coughing up blood and feel short of breath all the time.
prognosis: Variable; may progress to pulmonary fibrosis with poor long-term outcomes without treatment
description: A rare condition characterized by recurrent diffuse alveolar hemorrhage leading to hemosiderin deposition in the lungs. Pathogenesis involves autoimmune-mediated damage to pulmonary capillaries. Diagnosis requires exclusion of other causes of pulmonary hemorrhage.
